articles.title: Tom Brady shows support for Patriots ahead of Super Bowl LX after saying he ‘doesn’t have a dog in the fight’
articles.description:
“You know I got your back RKK.”

The post Tom Brady shows support for Patriots ahead of Super Bowl LX after saying he ‘doesn’t have a dog in the fight’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tom Brady publicly supports the Patriots ahead of Super Bowl LX on February 12, 2026.
Brady expressed solidarity with team owner Robert Kraft, stating, 'I got your back RKK.'
His endorsement boosts local morale and excitement among Boston fans for the upcoming game.
